titleStmt.title: Christenings make not Christians, or A briefe discourse concerning that name heathen, commonly given to the Indians. As also concerning that great point of their conversion. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Roger, 1604?-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iane Coe, for I.H.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
End of work signed: "Your unworthy country-man, Roger Williams".
